Smart Iron: A clothes iron that uses artificial intelligence to learn the user's preferences and automatically adjust the temperature, steam, and pressure to achieve the perfect ironing results.
Multi-Purpose Iron: A clothes iron that can be used for ironing clothes, curtains, bedding, and even shoes. It can also be used as a steamer to remove wrinkles from delicate fabrics.
Iron with Built-In Storage: A clothes iron with a built-in storage compartment for storing ironing boards, steam wands, and other accessories.
Portable Iron: A compact and lightweight clothes iron that can be easily transported from one location to another. It can be used for both home and professional ironing needs.
Iron with Voice Control: A clothes iron that can be controlled using voice commands. The user can simply say "iron on" or "iron off" to start or stop the ironing process.
